onboard-1-body: Habichat is a different kind of social network, it connects people who live in the same neighbourhood - not those who live on the other side of the planet.
onboard-2-body: Plan community events, make new friends, sell items, ask advice, find local services, and stay up-to-date about the area in which you live - Together we can do so much!
onboard-3-body: (1) We don't ask for your street address. (2) We don't require you to log in using other social media profiles. (3) You are free to post annonymously and share as much or as little as you prefer.
canadian-phone-error: Please enter a Canadian phone number.
habichat-not-available: Habichat hasn't launched in your community, but we're working on it. Promise!
never-miss-an-update: and we'll let you know as soon as we launch!
